list.name: Issues Opened
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

list.name: Issues Closed
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)
